meanings.definition: To sign one's name on the back of a document as proof of payment or endorsement
meanings.sent1: She indorsed the check before depositing it at the bank.
meanings.sent2: The author indorsed each copy of the book for the fans.
meanings.sent3: The cat indorsed the contract by leaving a paw print on it.
meanings.sent4: The stars indorsed the night sky with their shimmering light.
meanings.sent5: The athlete indorsed the sports equipment with his signature.
